content: the other arm hands use orange yarn row 1 chain 2 1 turning chain row 2 slip_stitch in both the top and bottom legs of the 2 chs row 3 chain 1 chain 2 1 turning chain pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin row 4 slip_stitch in both the top and bottom legs of the 2 chs row 5 chain 1 chain 2 1 turning chain row 6 slip_stitch in both the top and bottom legs of the 2 chs finish off and leave a long tail to sew to the end of the arm hide the tail in the upper arm because when you later attach the hand claws there will be a lot of yarn hiding in the lower arm repeat for second hand hand claws use white yarn chain 1 and pull for a medium tail tighten the knot repeat 6 times sew to the tip of each finger through the top thread of yarn tread each tail to either side of the tip and you can secure the claw by threading the tail through the arm exiting through the same hole and tie the tails together and then hide the tails in the arm do your best to not have the white yarn show when you are hiding it tail you will be making a continuingly decreasing cone when you feel ready add some stuffing do not overfill you just need some stuffing in the base really it still should be very bendy pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin also please note that the non-decreasing rounds shift the yellow color to the left to prevent twisting see images the colors are different because i was working on the dragonite pattern while writing this technique use orange yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 4 switch to yellow single_crochet increase x 2 18 round 4 work this round in the back loops 12 single_crochet in orange 6 single_crochet in yellow 18 round 5 in orange single_crochet decrease in orange 7 single_crochet in orange decrease in orange single_crochet in yellow and work in the v of the previous stitch 4 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in the v of the previous stitch in yellow 16 round 6 11 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow and work in the v of the previous stitch the next yellow stitch will feel like you are skipping a stitch 4 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in the v of the previous stitch in yellow 16 the next orange stitch will feel like you are skipping a stitch round 7 4 single_crochet in orange decrease in orange 4 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow and work in the v of the previous stitch single_crochet in yellow decrease in yellow single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in the v of the previous stitch in yellow 14 pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin round 8 10 single_crochet
